results.content:
I enjoyed the taking the course.
It is really informative and i learnt a lot.
The only problem I have is trying to understand the next topics because they are not tailored with the previous topics.
In general I enjoyed the course.
Thank you Kalob!

results.content: Fantastic instructor, always energetic and keeps content interesting

results.content: It was a good match for me. It was definitively a challenge, but I am happy that I made it to the end.
results.content_html: It was a good match for me. It was definitively a challenge, but I am happy that I made it to the end.

results.content: If you are looking to become a web developer, this is not the place. You learn some stuff about HTML and CSS, and then you are expected to just nod along as the instructor uses frameworks that are not comprehensive, explained or functional. That's right, folks. They just don't work. Not even on the resources files.
results.content_html: If you are looking to become a web developer, this is not the place. You learn some stuff about HTML and CSS, and then you are expected to just nod along as the instructor uses frameworks that are not comprehensive, explained or functional. That's right, folks. They just don't work. Not even on the resources files.

results.content: I'm really enjoying this course ,though Git is really painful to use but over all this course is very helpful  for old and new developers .Thank You for creating this course. = )

results.content: It's a great course to becoming a web developer. I'd recommend the course to anyone.
results.content_html: It's a great course to becoming a web developer. I'd recommend the course to anyone.

results.content: On 15% progress but I'm loving the process. I had been self-teaching and having this course sharpens my knowledge. Very precise and understandable instructor. Though I learned some basics before, I never skipped topic as each topic can makes me relearn and unlearn some learnings I have before. I am planning to take another course after this. Thank you Sir Kalob :)

results.content: Kursus ini sangat lengkap dan detail..sejauh ini disetiap langkah saya menemukan semua yang saya butuhkan untuk pengembangan web. Saya tidak sabar untuk segera bisa menyelesaikan sisa kursus ini dan kemudian mempraktekannya.
